title: Three MPs withdraw support to govt.
body_lines: Three MPs Faizal Cassim, M. S. Thowfeek and Ishak Rahuman would refrain from supporting the government, MP Faizal Cassim said today.
He told Parliament that the three MPs would not support the government anymore.
The three Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) MPs extended support to the government to pass the 20th Amendment and worked with the government thereafter.
